comments.author: Abid
comments.content: We also been there on 25th June 2005. Wonderfull experience at Qari Rehmatullah’s site. Facilities there are quite good and improved. That place is really amzing specially the chill while dancing arouns the CampFire and some late night stars. Stars are too many …!
